group1.name: Bazzi
group1.desc:
A nonchalant racer who enjoys speed.
Sometimes he gets into trouble
by his erratic behavior
but luck always
with him.
group1.speech:
Don't bother, I'll just leave... Huh?
Found the villain!

group2.name: Dao
group2.desc:
An orthodox racer with a sense of justice.
sometimes hesitant
but
overcomes anything with great enthusiasm.
group2.speech: I'm going to be the best racer in the world!

group3.name: Dizini
group3.desc:
A girl with excellent empathy.
He is affectionate and careful.
She can't hold back her anger and explodes
turns 180 degrees.
group3.speech:
Watch out for slowdown and cornering...
I told you!!!

group4.name: Marid
group4.desc:
A confident and luxurious girl.
She believes she can do anything
if she puts her mind to it.
even get Dao's attention
group4.speech: Hmph, if you put your mind to it, it's not even possible to get first place

group5.name: Brodi
group5.desc:
The factory manager wrapped in a veil.
He puts out an unusual figure
but when the cart is finished
he jumps up like a child and loves it.

group6.name: Chris
group6.desc:
A genius hacker who just wants to have fun
.
Runs his own tracks.
Black Company just
joined just for fun.

group7.name: Neo
group7.desc:
The hero of Moonhill City.
Leaving behind the dark path of the past
he became a hero
his identity is hidden.
group7.speech: Follow me. I will guide you to safety.

group8.name: Sophia
group8.desc:
A hacker from France.
He's as good at hacking as Chris.
He has a blunt personality and stays at home
, giving off a dark aura
No malice whatsoever.

group9.name: Mos
group9.desc:
An engineer and racer
who loves karts.
He values smooth races
and offers effective practice.
group9.speech: Leave the maintenance and practice to me!

group10.name: Uni
group10.desc:
A young but gifted
little racer.
The goal is to win the race and order a special cart
that fits your
body type.

group11.name: Airi
group11.desc:
A bubbly engineer from Brazil.
He sets out to steer his criminal friend Chris
on the right path.

group12.name: Eihi
group12.desc:
A schoolboy
racer who learned how to kart from books.
As a sensible technician, he
tested karts he designed himself
and built up his skills.
group12.speech: Hey guys, check out this book! Don't yawn...

group13.name: Rex
group13.desc:
The villain of Moonhill City.
The strongest racer among the Rathaimen created by Mayor Zippy.
group13.speech:
Neo is a hero?
Traitors can't be heroes!

group14.name: Kephi
group14.desc:
A cowardly gluttonous racer who likes to eat as much as a cart.
No matter how rough the road, if there is a donut at the end

it will jump at any risk.
group14.speech: I love donuts~ I love donuts~ hehe

group15.name: Brian
group15.desc:
A hot-blooded detective from England.
Ready to run to the end of the earth
to eradicate crime.
He is usually friendly, but he can be a single-minded individual when it comes to investigations
do.

group16.name: Raive
group16.desc:
A rising star who appeared like a comet!
She
rocks her tracks with upbeat music, but
her private life
is kept under a veil.
group16.speech: All that matters is that I'm enjoying myself.
